nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements
Interface ReferenceService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
ReferenceServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
ReferenceServiceImpl, ReferenceServiceSecurity
public interface ReferenceService
extends Service

Service interface for member references

Author:
luis
